locutie.beschrijving: A farewell sermon reflecting on 42 years of ministry, the sufficiency of the Word of God (Revelation 22), and the legacy of grace left to the congregation.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: Theological and thematic rather than technical. Focuses on the 'gravity' of the canon's closure.

illocutie.beschrijving: The sermon shifts from personal testimony (Assertive/Expressive) to a powerful series of testamentary promises (Commissive) and a final charge (Directive).
voorbeelden: I leave to you the promise of his Savior
I offer something by God's grace
The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: Consolation, assurance of continuity, and a sense of divine presence despite the preacher's departure.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Explicitly mentions the 'old promise of the sent Comforter' as the source of preaching's mystery.

voorbeelden: I have but skimmed the surface
God's Word does not need to be added to
Stoop down, and drink and live
I shudder when I read these words
I leave to my successor... the promise
I leave to any who are sad the ancient promise
I do offer something by God's grace
commissieven.kwaliteit: High. The preacher uses his apostolic authority to bequeath God's promises to specific groups.

voorbeelden: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all
declaratieven.autoriteit: Strong. The repetition of the benediction functions as a performative blessing.

constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: Provides context for the gravity of the Word before the performative turn.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: Highly specific and addressed to different 'states' of the hearer (sad, weary, old).
voorbeelden: I leave to all who feel weary on the way the word from on high

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Personal testimony and the act of bequeathing (I leave, I give).

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Direct address to the congregation ('my people') and the successor.
tweede_persoon.performatieve_context: Used to deliver the promises directly to the 'you'.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Describing the nature of the Word and the world.
derde_persoon.distantie_effect: Low; used to set the stage for the personal address.

tijdloos_present.gebruik: Truths about the Word of God.

actueel_present.gebruik: The act of parting and the current distribution of grace.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: Moves from the Assertive (The Word is serious) to the Commissive (I leave you the promise) to the Directive (March on).
voorbeelden: I leave to all who feel weary... (Commissive) -> March on (Directive)
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: Excellent. The imperatives are strictly grounded in the preceding promises.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: When thou passest through the waters, I will be with thee... March on.

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon transcends being a 'speech about' a departure; it becomes the 'act' of passing a mantle. The preacher uses the pulpit to actually distribute the riches of the Word.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: I leave to all who with me grow old... 'When thou passest through the waters, I will be with thee.'
sterke_punten.effect: Creates a tangible legacy for the hearer.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The story is told that Reinhold Niebuhr...

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: The sermon is an event because it performs the transition of pastoral care through the performative act of 'leaving' promises.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: The preacher acts as a 'mandataris' of God, distributing the 'living water' to the thirsty.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: Yes, the preacher views the Word as God's complete and final address.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: Yes, especially in the 'I leave to you' section.
tekstueel_bewijs: I offer something by God's grace

pneumatologie.geest_rol_erkend: Yes, the 'sent Comforter' is the source of the preaching's efficacy.
pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: Implicitly left to the Spirit to 'quench the thirst' and 'revive the soul'.
tekstueel_bewijs: That is a mystery which... I do not understand at all.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: The sermon is treated as a means of grace (Toezegging).
sacramentstheologie.epifanisch_taalgebruik: The imagery of the 'balcony rail of glory' and 'sweet fields of Eden' creates an epiphanic horizon.
tekstueel_bewijs: directed me to the healing fountains

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is remarkably balanced, moving from 'I have' (testimony) to 'God says' (assertion) to 'I leave' (commissive).

toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Maintain the liturgical rhythm of the 'I leave to you' section.

adressering_verbetering.suggestie: The shift from 'I' to 'You' in the final third is a masterclass in homiletical address.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: The 'March on' command is perfectly sustained by the preceding promises.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: This sermon is a textbook example of how a preacher's 'I' can serve the 'I' of God, turning a farewell into a sacramental event of grace.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SvT would focus on the 'Relationship' aspect of the farewell; SAT reveals how the preacher uses 'Declaratives' to actually change the spiritual status of the congregation from 'orphaned' to 'endowed'.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: Rhetoric would admire the 'March on' repetition; SAT identifies it as a Directive empowered by the Commissive 'I will be with you'.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT highlights that the 'legacy' is not just a metaphor, but a linguistic act of transfer (Commissive).

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: I leave to any who are sad the ancient promise...
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: Transforms the sermon into a last will and testament.

appendices.notities: The preacher successfully avoids the 'Constative Surplus' by moving quickly from the history of his ministry to the present distribution of the Word's power.
